examples.korean: The ship sent up distress flares to attract the attention of the coastguard. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 배는 해안 경비대의 관심을 유도하기 위해 조난 신호탄을 쏘아 올렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ship sent up distress flares to attract the attention of the coastguard. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The coastguard was alerted. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 해안 경비대가 경계 태세를 갖추고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The coastguard was alerted. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They radioed Dover Coastguard. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 도버 해안 경비대에 무선 연락을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They radioed Dover Coastguard. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The guard is / are being inspected today. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경비대가 오늘 조사를 받고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
